projects.name: Learnify
projects.description: A sleek and dynamic website built with Remix, designed to showcase Learnify's innovative web solutions for schools and educational institutions in Kenya. With a modern, responsive UI and fast, seamless navigation, the site offers an engaging experience for visitors. It highlights Learnify's services and values, making it the go-to platform for revolutionary educational technology.

projects.name: ShopSmart E-commerce App
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce application built using the MERN stack and Remix, with user authentication and a seamless shopping experience.

projects.name: To-Do List App
projects.description: A feature-rich to-do list app with state management, browser storage, and an intuitive UI.

projects.name: Tevin's Restaurant
projects.description: A restaurant web app that allows users to browse menus, place orders, and leave reviews, using open-source APIs

projects.name: Graspable Dreams
projects.description: A platform designed to help users set and track their goals, with motivational features.

projects.name: MovieStream
projects.description: A movie streaming application built with TMDb API, offering search, trending movies, and personalized recommendations.

projects.name: Weather Application
projects.description: A stylish and dynamic weather app built with Remix, TypeScript, and the OpenWeather API. It provides real-time weather updates with an intuitive interface, featuring temperature, humidity, wind speed, and forecasts. The app is fully responsive, offering a seamless experience on both mobile and desktop devices.
